column4: Hi, I'm trying to boot into the new 10.10 liveCD, but when I do the boot hangs with the error http://pastebin.com/ePMbtx3L .  I've asked dr. google and it seems the problem has to do with dmraid, so i disconnected all my raid devices but this still happens!  does anyone have an idea as to what is happening?
check ur md5sums and redownload and reburn. make sure you are not using cheap media (ie cheap cd, cheap flash drive)
i've checked the md5sum's and they work out.... also i've tried with 3 different USB keys, currently with a lexar one
i've tried with two lexars and one kingston keys... all give the same problems
